creator: jpetrula@hotmail.com
text:
Apache Tomcat 6.0
Documentation Index
http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/index.html

The following links on above page are bad:

Functional Specifications
http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/catalina/funcspecs/index.html

Catalina Javadocs
http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/catalina/docs/api/index.html

Jasper Javadocs
http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/jasper/docs/api/index.html

Created attachment 20994
Fixes bad link in documentation, and an invalid ant mkdir command for the associated documentation.

This should fix one of the links in the reported bug.  However three bad links
were reported.	The other two JavaDoc links seem to have been previously fixed.
However, the changes do not seem to be publishing from the SVN repository to
the main Tomcat 6 Documentation site.
creator: paul.shemansky@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 21013
More comprehensive patch 

Fixes image refs and link back to home refs too. as well as incorporates the
good stuff from the previous patch
